1.title: Enter a Titan
1.plot: Newcomer Ken Kerr and the 600 ton beast Myrtle Irene threaten Shawn's plan to build his megadredge. The elements jeopardize Emily's plan to dive deeper. Kris heads to The Bluff with a new dredge, but faces complications.

2.title: Crash Course
2.plot: To fund the mega-dredge, Shawn races to the Bluff where Kris is onto some of the best gold. Emily's most promising summer might suddenly be dashed on the rocks.

3.title: Wild Wild West
3.plot: Shawn and Kris battle encroaching miners, Ken's beastly Myrtle Irene continues to invade and operating costs soar; Emily expands her operation, but an air malfunction threatens her season.

4.title: Over the Line
4.plot: In the Bluff's lawless waters, Shawn and Kris wield brute strength and verbal threats to stand their ground as raging competition forces captains to change tactics. In Nome, Emily and George use brainpower, gambling on new strategies and resources.

5.title: Storm Surge
5.plot: The approach of a violent storm pits safety against the drive to succeed; Ken rushes to free the Myrtle before it's destroyed; Kris risks being stranded; Shawn mines until the Bering Sea rips up his dredge; Emily attempts to appease nature.

6.title: Miners on the Storm
6.plot: A violent midsummer storm forces the fleet off the mining grounds. Shawn, Ken, Emily and Kris race to repair and improve their dredges for an end of season attack while reliving some of their most dangerous and triumphant moments on the Bering Sea.

7.title: Second Wind
7.plot: With the summer season half-over, Mr Gold tries to stay ahead of Ken Kerr. The Myrtle Irene continues toward her 1,200 oz. goal.

8.title: Every Ounce Counts
8.plot: Shawn works overtime to cover for his exhausted crew; Kris is blind-sided by the loss of his lead diver; Emily jumps in to prevent a fuel spill; Ken and George collaborate to find Myrtle a mother lode.

9.title: Closing the Gap
9.plot: Winter winds force the captains to reevaluate risk and reward; Shawn's mega barge extraction takes a turn for the worse; Ken pushes the Myrtle to the limit on a five day run; Emily sends her divers deeper; Kris invents a new form of prospecting.

10.title: Innovate & Overcome
10.plot: In a race against winter, Shawn extends his sluice to get more gold; Ken pushes the Myrtle 24 hours a day; Emily tangles with the tide; Kris battles a bed of quartz; George enjoys a season ending dive with his son.

11.title: King of Nome
11.plot: Desperate to be Nome's gold king, Shawn risks the Christine Rose in dangerous waters. Ken struggles to free the Myrtle from the harbor. Emily fights a fouled air line and Kris attempts one more dive at the Bluff.

12.title: Bigger & Badder
12.plot: In a shocking confrontation, Nome's top two miners, Shawn and Ken, come face to face after a season of squaring off, having revolutionized mining with bigger, badder, gold-grabbing machines. Secrets are revealed through never before seen footage.

1.title: Paydirt
1.plot: In Nome, Alaska, the gold rush is on. Meet the dredgers, driven by gold fever and sometimes desperate need, who pilot their ragtag dredges and dive with hoses to suck up gold from the bottom of the frigid, unpredictable Bering Sea.

2.title: One Bad Deal
2.plot: A bar brawl threatens Shawn's health and the future of the Christine Rose. Meanwhile, the Wild Ranger struggles with a leak and an injured crew member.

3.title: Suction
3.plot: The weather may be perfect, but storms are brewing onboard the dredges as egos clash and tempers flare. Emily's first dive is almost her last when she learns the dangers of dredging first-hand.

4.title: A Viking Funeral
4.plot: The season is halfway over, and tensions are running high as the dredgers search for new sweet spots. An accident with the 15 ton excavator threatens to end one deckhand's season.

5.title: Captaincy
5.plot: Simmering grievances come to the boil when Wild Ranger owner Vern fires one of his crew. Meanwhile, a jammed sluice box leads to a bitter fight between Zeke and Emily.

6.title: Eureka!
6.plot: On the Christine Rose, a hastily welded winch roller gives way, releasing a cable that throws a crew member overboard. Scott insists on diving despite his injured leg.

7.title: Bad Vibrations
7.plot: As the season draws to a close, The Sluicey finally enjoys some success. Scott swallows his pride and invites Steve back to the Wild Ranger. But will he accept?

8.title: The Bitter End
8.plot: As winter descends on Nome, the crews make the most of the last few days of the season before facing off at an auction for next year's dredging grounds.

0.title: Back to the Dredge
0.plot: The Bering Sea Gold crews gather and sound off about life in Nome during and after the show. Wild Ranger Scott and Vern's reunion is explosive. Emily and Zeke answer about the exact nature of their relationship. Meet the mysterious white-bearded dredger.

1.title: Point of No Return
1.plot: SEASON PREMIERE: The Pomrenkes get off to a bad start with family squabbles and a $25K bill. Zeke and Scott M have powerful new dredges but can they rely on their crew of friends? Vernon goes all in, gambling all his savings and his deckhand daughter.

2.title: Dead Men Gather No Gold
2.plot: John is out of hospital and back dredging, but Zeke may lose it all when accused of claim jumping. Plus, Scott puts the crew at risk dredging during a storm.

3.title: Nice Guys Finish Last
3.plot: Summer storms keep the miners off the water, which loses them valuable time. Meanwhile, Zeke proves he wasn't claim jumping but gets shut down any way.

4.title: Gold Gettin' Hound Dog
4.plot: Big swells and bigger tempers take over the Bering Sea. Inexperience and equipment problems cause more than a few tantrums, while big swells and bad conditions make some miners lose their lunch.

5.title: Greedy People
5.plot: Scott goes out dredging without crew, but hits a honey hole. Meanwhile, Zeke goes back to 'The Clark' and gets too close to a neighbour's lease.

6.title: No Snivelin'
6.plot: Pressure mounts as the fleet reaches the season's halfway mark. The Pomrenkes face the law and will Scott Meisterheim's binge finally bring about his breakdown?

7.title: Dirtville
7.plot: The season's end is approaching, and every miner's back is against the wall. With debts mounting and feuds escalating, one skipper loads his rifle and one blows his stack.

8.title: Go Big or Go Home
8.plot: Check out the new season of Bering Sea Gold, Fridays at 10PM E/P. With Scott MIA, Vernon hires the ANGER MANAGEMENT crew who are sitting dead in the water, but his own crew -- and daughter -- are also MIA.

9.title: Don't Tell Me to Chillax!
9.plot: Steve Riedel battles to save his job. Shawn Pomrenke heads to prison as his father dredges to save their family compound. A runaway skiff causes Zeke to blow up at diver John Bunce. Nome gathers to crown the fastest gold panner in town.

10.title: Gold Stress
10.plot: Zeke and Emily's relationship is buckling under the strain of work and the elements, while Shawn Pomrenke returns from prison determined to make up for lost time.

11.title: And No More Shall We Part
11.plot: Zeke, Emily and Steve mourn the death of a friend, as Shawn and Cody battle to patch a rapidly increasing hole in the hull of the 'Christine Rose'.

12.title: The American Dream
12.plot: The dredgers break through Nome's frozen harbor for one last shot at gold. Scott Meisterheim's dredging season is headed for failure -- again, but the CHRISTINE ROSE scores big. Zeke blames himself for John Bunce's death.

13.title: Getting to the Bottom
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Fire and Icebergs
1.plot: In Nome, Alaska, the gold rush is on! Meet the dredgers who pilot their dredges and dive with hoses to suck up gold from the bottom of the frigid, unpredictable Bering Sea.

2.title: Off the Deep End
2.plot: The Pomrenkes have to call for help when rough seas break their vessel, Emily's crew set out to re-teach her how to dredge and Zeke reveals his run-in with the law.

3.title: Burn It Down
3.plot: It's beautiful dredging weather, but things are ugly. The Pomrenkes swallow their pride and ask megadredger Hank for help to get their pinned barge operating again.

4.title: Let the Games Begin
4.plot: An unexpected visit from the Coast Guard doesn't go well for two dredges. Meanwhile, Hank's dredge gets a bit too close to the Christine Rose's claim.

5.title: Who's the Captain?!
5.plot: Halfway through the summer season, tempers flare and the captains question their crews' loyalty with Shawn threatening to quit the family business.

6.title: 10 Pounds of Gold
6.plot: The Pomrenkes hit pay dirt and bring in 10 pounds of gold. Meanwhile, recently fired Scott swallows his pride and asks Hank for his old job back, but will he last?

7.title: Backhoe Wars
7.plot: As the season's midway point passes, some dredges struggle to make a profit. Captains are challenged by uncooperative crew and relationships of all kinds are tested.

8.title: Money Money Money
8.plot: Winter closes in, sending the gold dredgers sprinting down the season's homestretch. Every moment counts, as rivals Shawn Pomerenke and Hank Schimschat clash over territory.

9.title: Mr. Gold & the New Kid
9.plot: The two megadredges race to reach a contested claim site. Hank wins the race, but Shawn gets the last laugh. Plus, Emily heads out with her new, poached crew.

10.title: The Rescue & the Repo
10.plot: Late summer's weather drives the dredges reluctantly off their best spots and finally breaks the Kellys. Meanwhile, Steve loses his dredger to the repo man.

11.title: The Final Showdown
11.plot: As Nome Harbour freezes over, the crews head out for one last chance at success. It's battle of the barges when Hank wagers Shawn who can box more gold.

12.title: Dredged Up
12.plot: Edited from three episodes of season three, this three hour special contains bonus scenes, tweets, and facts about the show.

1.title: Good Morning, Viet-Nome
1.plot: Nome, Alaska. The summer season kicks off as captains race to reclaim the gold the melting ice forced them to leave behind. One miner returns with a dastardly plan, while a rocky father and son relationship turns explosive.

2.title: Escape Goat
2.plot: As a storm closes in on Nome, tensions rise in the fleet. While the dredgers battle rough seas to get the gold, the Pomrenkes disagree about Steve's dream to go mining inland.

3.title: Namby-Pamby Mugwumps
3.plot: The summer mining season heats up and everyone is feeling the pressure to get gold. A near-fatal mishap and personnel problems plague the fleet, proving once again that the Bering Sea doesn't give up her gold easily.

4.title: No Man Left Behind
4.plot: The summer season is well underway, but pressure to get gold is turning the miners against each other. For the Pomrenkes, Steve's inland mining plan may lead to breaking up the family business.

5.title: Daddy Driving a Caddy
5.plot: At midseason, the self-proclaimed best dredger in Nome is quitting the fleet. And though Brad Kelly welcomes a baby girl into his family, complications of the birth may claim the life of her mother.

6.title: Brokedown City
6.plot: Rough conditions on the Bering Sea are taking their toll on men and machines. A breakdown strands the Au Grabber at sea, while one of Emily's divers realizes he's too broke to continue dredging.

7.title: I Quit!
7.plot: Bonds are tested and broken as two family teams split up. On the Eroica, Emily struggles to discipline her divers and it backfires on her. But disaster turns into opportunity as Kris buys a piece of a dredge.

8.title: Smoke Em' Out
8.plot: The gloves are coming off as the fleet fights for their season goals. Captain Vernon Adkison and Captain Emily Riedel look for last-minute new hires to get them the gold as the summer starts to come to an end.

9.title: The Battle for Tomcod
9.plot: Four crews rush to clean out the gold-rich Tomcod claim and an all-out gold war ensues. Meanwhile, Captain Emily Riedel and her new diver face a battle all their own.

10.title: Payback
10.plot: The season freezes to a halt as the dredges rush out for their final push for gold. One family reunites as another family falls apart and revenge, like the beginning of winter, is served cold.

1.title: Countdown to Gold
1.plot: This winter, strict deadlines force the fleet to take extreme measures. Vern gambles on a state-of-the-art dredge while Shawn ventures into the harsh wilderness in search of the next golden hotspot, and Emily unleashes a team of all-girl divers on Nome.

2.title: Girl Drama
2.plot: With a shortened ice mining season, every second counts. But just as the fleet seems set to dial in on the gold, equipment problems cause setbacks, costing each crews precious time under the water.

3.title: The Quest
3.plot: Near the midpoint of the shortened mining season, every dredge must hustle to stay on the gold. But in their haste, small miscalculations lead to massive problems, throwing every operation into question.

4.title: Baggage
4.plot: Through the halfway point of the ice mining season, every operation is pulling out all the stops to make it pay. But they'll have to contend with the weight of the past before they can land on future riches.

5.title: The Blizzard
5.plot: With less than a week remaining in the shortest ice mining season on record, every crew is battling the clock. But just when they think it couldn't get any harder, a massive Arctic storm descends on Nome.

6.title: The Deadline
6.plot: After a month out on the ice, one day remains in the 2015 ice mining season. For every miner, that's one more day to prove that a season full of risks was worth the cost.

7.title: Digging Deep
7.plot: After five seasons on the Bering Sea, we recap the struggles and triumphs of the Pomrenke family, the star-crossed lovers Zeke and Emily, Vernon's various crew issues, and the chaos that is the Fightin' Kellys.

1.title: The Gamble
1.plot: This summer, with the mining grounds picked clean, the fleet bets it all on new tech, new claims, and new opportunities. Shawn must deal with dad before hitting the Bluff, Brad attempts to bring his family back together with the promise of an adventure.

2.title: Pressure
2.plot: With the season in full swing, every dredge must quickly adjust to new situations in order to stay on the gold. Mechanical problems plague several operations, and the Kellys try to get familiar with their new claims.

3.title: Golden Dreams
3.plot: Before Shawn can head to the Bluff, he must contend with another setback on the Christine Rose. While Derek finds out what the baddest dredge in Alaska can really do, Vernon hatches a plan to steal a boat from an old enemy.

4.title: Father's Day
4.plot: Mining is a family business, which means Father's Day in Nome has a whole new meaning. While Shawn looks to give his dad a golden gift for the inland mining operation, he pauses to pass on a dive lesson to his own son.

5.title: Rock Bottom
5.plot: Corporate bosses force Zeke into an unlikely partnership. Shawn is desperate for gold, torn between his father's inland dreams and his venture on the bluff. The Kelly's hope to salvage their season. Vern finally sinks his dredge.

6.title: Breaking Point
6.plot: A lack of gold has everyone on edge. Shawn's dad breaks his word, leading to a massive family eruption. Emily gets news that could end her season. On the brink of financial ruin, Vern and Derrick risk everything to keep dredging.

7.title: Teamwork
7.plot: After a blowup at the inland mining site has father and son on the outs, the Pomrenkes must reunite or risk losing the operation. Over at the High Noon, a grave mistake puts Derek and the dredge in danger, forcing him to call for help.

8.title: Turf War
8.plot: While Shawn Pomrenke prepares to head to the Bluff, his old rival, Derek McLarty, attempts to pull one over on a distracted Mr. Gold. As for Steve Pomrenke, the first cleanup of the inland mining operation will finally prove the old man right or wrong.

9.title: All In
9.plot: After a season of waiting, Shawn finally takes the Christine Rose down to the Bluff. Back in Nome, Vernon needs to hit it big or risk losing his $200,000 investment, while Zeke and Emily manage to find common ground.

10.title: Jackpot
10.plot: Shawn returns to Nome to find Derek on his spot, setting up a showdown at the High Noon. As the final gold hauls are tallied, Steve finds out whether or not his inland dream was worth the work.

11.title: The Gold Bar
11.plot: The epic 2015 summer mining season has come to an end. Steve and Shawn Pomrenke, the Kellys, Zeke Tenhoff and Emily Riedel, Derek McLarty and Vernon Adkison come to the historic Gold Dust Saloon to air their grievances and share their memories.

1.title: Virgin Ground
1.plot: A modern day gold rush is sparked when Shawn Pomreinke offers the fleet access to his virgin claim of untouched Bering Sea floor, rumored to contain 14 million of dollars of gold. But access comes at a price.

2.title: Fear the Reaper
2.plot: When Zeke's custom sluice malfunctions, Emily must step up to try and save the Clark's season. The Kelly clan moves in too close to Vernon's claim and Mr. Gold races to plug a hole that's threatening to devastate his budding empire.

3.title: The Plague
3.plot: With the ice season in high gear, a flu hits the dredgers like a plague threatening to knock every operation out of the race. For the Pomrenkes, a mistake by father Steve could thwart their inland dreams and end their quest for empire.

4.title: Double Jeopardy
4.plot: Halfway through ice season, desperation kicks in. Teams risk it all, bringing in experimental equipment and infamous ex-employees in their quest to double production. But will the gambles pay off or will the crews lose everything?

5.title: Backseat Diver
5.plot: With two weeks left in the season, the window to mine gold is closing. Zeke's experiment with a double length hose puts his brother in danger. The High Noon's water heater suffers a lethal malfunction and tempers boil at the Wild Ranger.

6.title: Lady Luck
6.plot: With nine days left, desperation and opportunity set the tone in Nome. A double sluice and lack of divers mean that Emily Riedel must confront her deepest fear if the Clark is to succeed. Shawn "Mr. Gold" Pomrenke discovers the land sale of a lifetime.

7.title: Hello Heartache, Goodbye Nome
7.plot: With three days left in the season, miners push themselves to the brink. Sleep, safety, and sanity are out the window in order to dredge maximum gold. Shawn Pomrenke's master plan is about to pay out.

1.title: Uncharted Waters
1.plot: As the 2016 summer mining season begins, gold in Nome is drying up, pushing miners to extreme new locations in a desperate search for gold. Zeke heads miles off shore to Sledge Island while Shawn seeks to build his empire with a new claim at the Bluff.

2.title: Cruel Summer
2.plot: The miners of Nome continue their far flung explorations in search of new gold. Zeke and Emily head to Sledge Island and Shawn continues his dreams of gold at the Bluff. Meanwhile, the Kelly's reputation may sink them before the season starts.

3.title: Hail Mary
3.plot: Desperate to find new gold, Shawn pushes himself and his equipment to the limit. At Sledge Island, the deeper water triggers dangerous side effects for Zeke. The Kelly's go upriver for a shot at redemption.

4.title: Proving Day
4.plot: Shawn's obsession with the Bluff reaches a tipping point. Zeke and Emily only have enough fuel for one more trip to Sledge Island. Undeterred by obstacles, Nome newcomer, George Young seeks his fortune on the Bering Sea floor.

5.title: Fickle Fortune
5.plot: Halfway through the season, Shawn Pomrenke needs massive gold at the Bluff or his empire will be ruined. After the debacle at Seldge Island, Zeke and Emily reach a breaking point. Buried in debt, Nome newcomer George Young remains optimistic.

6.title: Reaper Madness
6.plot: Anxious to reverse his fortunes, Zeke undertakes a perilous solo dive. The Kellys risk a thirteen-mile trip in their rinky-dink dredge. George is desperate to prove he's a capable diver before his brother leaves Nome.

7.title: Down & Out
7.plot: A back injury hobbles Shawn. Kris puts the Kellys on gold, but the claim owner has second thoughts. George is in a tight spot when getting gold means defying his brother.

8.title: Penny Dreadful
8.plot: At the mouth of the Penny River, Emily saves Zeke from a generator fire. Kris strikes a devil's bargain with the last willing claim owner in Nome. George loses his ace diver and brings his son, Landen, up to dredge in the dangerous Bering Sea.

9.title: Murky Waters
9.plot: Injured, Shawn depends on his crew and the mercy of the murky Bering Sea to salvage the empire. Zeke and Emily land on a career-saving spot but toxic fumes threaten more than their season. George faces a final dive and cleanout to determine his fate.

10.title: No Place Like Nome
10.plot: The Pomrenkes battle land and sea to vie for new gold-rich mining ground. Desperate, Zeke and Emily risk life and careers in a dangerous boating maneuver. Kris has one last chance to prove his Captaincy and mining skill if he wants to stay in Nome.

11.title: Luck of the Irish
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Gold Fever
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

0.title: Gold Getters
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Big Cold Gold
1.plot: Shawn's million dollar Bluff claim is denied, leaving the grounds open to anyone. Kris Kelly leaps at the opportunity, dragging his family across 70 miles of frozen tundra to what he hopes will be their biggest season yet.

2.title: Cold War
2.plot: Shawn and Kris square off when the Kelly family invades Shawn's turf at the Bluff. Emily hits the ice with a crew of veteran miners as she attempts to reclaim her hotspot at Hasting's Creek.

3.title: Tunnel Vision
3.plot: Shawn gambles on a risky move. Kris suffers a life-threatening air line freeze up and makes a decision about his brother. Zeke attempts the most dangerous dive of his life through twenty feet of ice.

4.title: Three's Company
4.plot: Shawn searches for a paystreak boulder to fund the Megadredge, but when it's flipped his season may be, too. Kris' dream of a 24-hour operation starts with a night crew, but he may wake to a nightmare. If Emily's last shot fails, she has to think bigger.

5.title: Cracked
5.plot: Kris' scheme to make a million on Shawn's Bluff find is sabotaged when Mr. Gold plots with a turncoat Kelly diver. Zeke may have found his mining future, but when the ice breaks up, he'll have to move to a gold spot hot enough to save the present.

6.title: Never Say Die
6.plot: Shawn must fix his landlocked barge, but faulty controls threaten the Megadredge dream. Brad threatens to split the family before Kris can rally back to the Bluff. With only a week's worth of dredging supplies, Emily rolls the dice, hoping for fast payoff

7.title: Fight and Flight
7.plot: Shawn tries to convince potential investors that his Megadredge vision is solid. Kris' frustration frays Andy's nerves. Zeke unleashes a secret weapon, but faces an unexpected challenge. Emily tries to pull her crew together to avoid an end to her season.

8.title: Last Man Diving
8.plot: To fund the Megadredge, Shawn races to the Bluff with only a day left in the season. Kris is on the best gold of his life, but his shoddy equipment keeps breaking down. Zeke is desperate to salvage the season, but can't find a paystreak.

9.title: Gold Nuggets
9.plot: Recap of season 9 on the ice with unseen footage, along with a preview of the 2017 summer season.

imdb.title: Bering Sea Gold
plot: Each season of the show follows a different group of dredgers, those who search for gold in shallow waters, at the bottom of the sea or even ocean. They often collect paydirt, ground from the seabed that contains some precious ore.
